title: What does a Python developer do?
body: Typically, a Python developer is the one who works on web development projects which involve server-side/back-end programming. They are the ones who help build AI-based machine learning and other web applications.

title: How long does it take to hire a remote Python developer from Uplers?
body: Hiring a Python Developer from Uplers can take up to seven business days. It is subjective to your requirements and time window.

title: What is the cost of hiring a dedicated Python developer through Uplers?
body: The cost of hiring a dedicated Python developer through Uplers depends on your business needs. Usually, we charge approximately $25 an hour, which is again subjective to your needs.

title: Do you provide a trial period for hiring a Python developer?
body: Yes, we offer a 2 weeks risk-free trial, wherein you can test the resource before actually deciding to hire them.

title: Will I have complete control over the team of hired developers?
